Foreword

This game was created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 from 1st to 8th of August 2020. The theme for this Game Jam was: "Rewind".

You can also find our other projects here.

Intro

A Game Jam is a good oppurtunity to learn new mechanics. This time I tried to learn more about Unity's new Input System, URP Forward Renderer and get my hands on something I have abandoned a long time: Human models and animations.

Moreover, it was my first time I creating a game for this genre.

Description

Agent Tempus is a fast paced twin-stick action co-op shooter with a time theme. You can play it locally with as many players as you have input devices. So multiple agents at the same time. This is possible, because the suit allows to switch room-time dimensions. But beware, a bullet can not differ between friend and enemy. Choose your side and keep the back free of the other agents.

The special element in this game is, if any player gets hit by a bullet, the time rewinds five seconds. This means every shooted bullet, every died enemy or player in this five seconds will come back.

Mission

The mission is simple: Find and infiltrate the Stem Corp. HQ.

During your mission you will encounter different enemies with different weapons. Every bullet is lethal. One hit kills you, your friends and your enemies. 

So use your dash move to avoid the bullets. If you get hit anyway, the time will rewind and you have another chance. Nevertheless, if you get hit after the rewind a second time before five seconds are over, you will die and the mission failed.

Controls

Move - WASD/Left Stick
Look - Mouse/Right Stick
Dash - Space/South Button
Shoot - LMB/R2/RT
Reload - auto/R/West Button

Restart - ESC
